sqlMap.statement: SELECT E.MDL_GRP_NM AS MDL_GRP_NM ,A.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AS SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,A.SVC_MACH_SQ_NUM AS SVC_MACH_SQ_NUM ,A.SER_NUM AS SER_NUM ,A.SVC_MACH_MSTR_STS_CD AS SVC_MACH_MSTR_STS_CD ,A.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD ,F.MDSE_ITEM_TP_CD AS MDSE_ITEM_TP_CD ,A.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_ITEM_CD ,'0000000' AS FILL_7_TXT ,TO_NUMBER(A.ISTL_DT) AS ISTL_DT ,TO_NUMBER(A.SVC_MACH_RMV_DT) AS SVC_MACH_RMV_DT ,TO_NUMBER(A.EFF_FROM_DT) AS EFF_FROM_DT FROM SVC_MACH_MSTR A ,SVC_CONFIG_MSTR B ,MDL_NM C ,DS_MDL D ,DS_MDL_GRP E ,MDSE F WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZUPTIME > TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(ADD_MONTHS(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD')), #addMonth#)), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') AND A.EZUPTIME < TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') AND A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = B.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND A.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = B.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK AND B.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD AND B.MDL_ID = C.T_MDL_ID AND B.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND B.MDL_ID = D.MDL_ID AND D.GLBL_CMPY_CD = E.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND D.MDL_GRP_ID = E.MDL_GRP_ID AND A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = F.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND A.MDSE_CD = F.MDSE_CD AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND B.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND D.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND E.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND F.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY A.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK ,A.SVC_MACH_SQ_NUM
